actions.name: Aura Spell
actions.description: Effect: The user's attacks that have a chance to inflict a [Major Affliction] or a [Minor Affliction] have a +10% increased chance and the duration of user-created Afflictions is increased by +2.

system.description: Effect: The user's attacks that have a chance to inflict a [Major Affliction] or a [Minor Affliction] have a +10% increased chance and the duration of user-created Afflictions is increased by +2.
